(O'Toole) Joseph Daniel O'Toole (a.k.a "JD") wants to join the Leone Family, with Vincenzo wanting to use him as an inside man against the Sindacco Family. However, his handler in the Sindacco Family is putting pressure on him, so Toni is told to deal with him. Smash and Grab Toni Cipriani Vincenzo Cilli $1,000 Hot Wheels (Cilli) Snappy Dresser (Ma Cipriani) Some of Vincenzo’s men have messed up a raid on a petrol station, with Vincenzo telling Toni to go sort the mess out. Hot Wheels Toni Cipriani Vincenzo Cilli Cheryl Ray Nothing Nothing Vincenzo wants Toni to pick up a car full of drugs near Portland Harbor.
